## Protocol.DOM.GetNodeForLocationRequest.includeUserAgentShadowDOM property

False to skip to the nearest non-UA shadow root ancestor (default: false).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includeUserAgentShadowDOM?: boolean;
```
